disfold.com.link: URL of the company's page on disfold.com, providing more details about the company.
disfold.com.name: The official name of the company.
disfold.com.headquarters: City and country where the company's main office is located.
disfold.com.employees: Number of people employed by the company. May be listed as 'Not found'.
disfold.com.ceo: Name of the company's Chief Executive Officer. May be listed as 'Not found'.
disfold.com.market_cap: Total market value of the company's outstanding shares, including currency and unit.
